org.opensaml.soap.messaging

Class AbstractHeaderGeneratingMessageHandler<MessageType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.AbstractInitializableComponent
      • org.opensaml.messaging.handler.AbstractMessageHandler<MessageType>
        • org.opensaml.soap.messaging.AbstractHeaderGeneratingMessageHandler<MessageType>
  • Type Parameters:
    MessageType - the type of message being processed.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.Component, net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.DestructableComponent, net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.InitializableComponent, MessageHandler<MessageType>

    public abstract class AbstractHeaderGeneratingMessageHandler<MessageType>
extends AbstractMessageHandler<MessageType>
    Abstract base class for message handlers that generate SOAP headers.
